mainText.attr1: If you have more than one base - you can transfer resources from base to base.
Energy, food, ore and crew can be requested.
The sourcing base launches a cargo ship carrying a pod with the resource.
Sourcing bases can be bases that you have a link to via a gate (out of sector bases).
Bases that can't produce ore - can thus have access to the resource.
Cargo ships are launched shortly (but not immediately) after the request is made
There is a relatively brief delay between launching cargo ships.
Resource requests are done in the base management interface (see topic Bases and Economy).
Select (to manage) the base doing the request (the base that will receive the resource)
When you have more than one base under your control - an additional interface appears (see image on right).
If you have more than two bases - you can cycle the sourcing base via the produced buttons.
Click on the request buttons next to the resource that you want to transfer.
The sourcing base can have up to 5 requests per resource.
